interfaceFramework

Class Pinky

  • java.lang.Object
    • interfaceFramework.Ghost
      • interfaceFramework.Pinky

  • public class Pinky
extends Ghost
    The class is for the pinky ghost. The class incorporates all the attributes that this ghost should have

     double y)

    • Method Detail

      • movePossible

        public void movePossible(Pacman pacman,
                int[][] board,
                Graphics g)
        Checking the possible movements that can be done by pinky if it is in scatter,chase or frightened move
        Parameters:
        pacman - the pacman object which is active in the game
        board - the board where the game is being played on by pacman and the ghosts
        g - the graphics which takes care of the drawing of different functions
